Title: 18 Miles Out
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (series of graphic novels), Tony Moore (series of graphic novels), Charlie Adlard (series of graphic novels), Scott M. Gimple, Glen Mazzara
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Jon Bernthal, Sarah Wayne Callies, Laurie Holden
Plot: Rick and Shane argue over what to do with Randall. Back at the farm, Lori, Andrea and Maggie deal with a suicidal Beth.
